title: PAX Skins
body: Could you get them off a mystery gift?

replies.body: is Festival {{champion:38}} a limited addition skin?
No its not. It's a legacy, cause its Festival, aka season or event skins. The Limited Edition skins are like super old prepaid card only obtainable skins.
No, and this is stated in multiple locations on the news entries as it is a reward skin and not a strictly purchasable one.
So could you get them by doing the reward thingy?
i dont believe so since they are consider Limited Edition and those aren't in Mystery Gift!
